basic.name: Harden Carapace (W)
basic.description: Gain a Shield that grants 40 Spell Armor and absorbs 340 damage over 3 seconds.

basic.name: Burrow Charge (E)
basic.description: Burrow to the target location, dealing 91 damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds.Burrow Charge can be reactivated to surface early.

heroic.name: Locust Swarm (R)
heroic.description: {highlight}Passively deal 12 damage per second to nearby enemies and each enemy damaged restores 6 health. Activate to increase by 300% all the effects. Lasts 6 seconds.{/highlight}

heroic.name: Cocoon (R)
heroic.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 7 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

trait.name: Scarab Host (T)
trait.description: Using an Ability spawns a Beetle which lasts for 8 seconds, attacking nearby enemies for 20 damage.

1.name: Azjol-Nerub Subterfuge
1.description: {highlight}Activate to submerge after 1 second, becoming invisible. Reactivate to emerge and knock nearby enemy heroes. Anub'arak won't be able to move while submerge{/highlight}

1.name: Legion of Beetles
1.description: {highlight}Enemies that dies within 3 seconds of Anub'arak basic attacks instantly spawn a legion beetle. Anub'arak basic attacks instantly kill troops.{/highlight}

1.name: Crypt Lord's Stinger
1.description: {highlight}Impale range travel 15% further, enemy heros hit on the extra range will have the stun increased to 1.5 and will reduce Impale cooldown by 3 seconds.{/highlight}

4.name: Bed of Barbs
4.description: Create a bed of spikes along Impale's path that slows enemies by 25% and deals 21 damage per second.  Spikes persist for 3.5 seconds.

4.name: Debilitation
4.description: {highlight}Impale reduces 30% spell power of enemy heroes hit for 4 seconds. Basic attacks refresh the duration{/highlight}

4.name: Nerubian Grasp
4.description: {highlight}Using Impale within 1.5 seconds of your Hardened Carapace being destroyed or expired slightly pull enemy heroes close to you.{/highlight}

7.name: Chitinous Plating
7.description: {highlight}While Hardened Carapace is active increase Anub'Arak health regeneration by 400%.{/highlight}
passives: {highlight} Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second {/highlight}

7.name: Urticating Spines
7.description: {highlight}Casting Harden Carapace will also deal 90 damage to nearby enemies. Deals double damage against Heroes. Hardened Carapace gives Anub'arak 30% movement speed while it's active.{/highlight}

7.name: Nerubian Armor
7.description: {highlight}Increase Hardened Carapace spell armor by 25. While Harden Carapace is active, taking damage from enemy Abilities reduces its cooldown by 0.5 second, up to 3 seconds.{/highlight}

10.name: Locust Swarm (R)
10.description: {highlight}Passively deal 12 damage per second to nearby enemies and each enemy damaged restores 6 health. Activate to increase by 300% all the effects. Lasts 6 seconds.{/highlight}

10.name: Cocoon
10.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 7 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

13.name: Hive Mind
13.description: {highlight}Activate to control your current Legion Beetles. Their duration is increased by 4 seconds{/highlight}

13.name: Beetle, Juiced
13.description: Beetles deal 6 damage per second to nearby enemies. {highlight}Increase beetles spell armor by 30 and health by 40%{/highlight}

13.name: Scarab Lord
13.description: {highlight}Beetles attacks against enemy heroes decrease Anub'arak basic abilities cooldown by 0.2 seconds.{/highlight}

16.name: Epicenter
16.description: Increases Burrow Charge impact area by 60% and lowers the cooldown by 1 second for each Hero hit.

16.name: Thorn Burst
16.description: {highlight}Activate while in Burrow Charge to surface early causing untalented impale to be casted in all directions around Anub'arak{/highlight}

16.name: Subterranean Reversion
16.description: {highlight}You can recast Burrow Charge to the initial cast position. Burrow Charge also grants a 400 point shield for 5 seconds{/highlight}

20.name: Hive Master
20.description: Gain a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every 3 seconds. The Vampire Locust deals 165 damage and returns to heal Anub'arak for 80 health {highlight}and decreasing the ultimate cooldown by 3 seconds. While the ultimate is active Anub'arak vampire Locust attacks every 0.5 seconds.{/highlight}

20.name: Cryptweave
20.description: {highlight}When Anub'arak uses Cocoon on an enemy hero, it creates a web area around them. Enemies in this area are slowed by 25%. Basic attacks while on the Web area reduces Cocoon cooldown by 4 seconds. The area lasts 8 seconds{/highlight}

20.name: Underking
20.description: {highlight}Activate to cast an Burrow Charge at the given position after 2.5 seconds.{/highlight}

20.name: Nerubian safe spot
20.description: {highlight}Activate to create an Cocoon at the target position. One allied hero can enter on the Cocoon at time, you can hold up and control up to 3 safe spots.{/highlight}
